reviewText:
I liked One special night...this is a great great movie...James Garner and Julie Andrews are a hoot but it is also a beautiful, beautiful story!  It had a nice surprise ending...I will enjoy this movie for years to come!

the movie Christmas clause was very predictable...wouldn't buy again or probably won't watch again...

Christmas Clouds was a cute movie...funny and just had some nice warm fuzzies in it!

One Special Night is one of my favorite holiday movies ever.  I am putty in the hands of Julie Andrews and James Garner.  If you are interested in seeing this movie, I strongly suggest you purchase it on its own.  If you want to know more about it, there are ample 5-star reviews on Amazon.

The other two movies - not so much.  I got maybe 10 minutes into Christmas Clause and turned it off.  A movie with vomiting in it just does not feel very festive, and by that point I was not nearly engaged enough to care what happened to Lea Thompson's character, much as I like that actress.

I lasted a little longer with Christmas in the Clouds, but only because I was appalled by how awful it was.  Loaded with racial and ethnic stereotypes, mistakenly billed as a "riotous comedy," I was truly embarrassed for the poor actors who thought it was a good idea to appear in this misbegotten holiday-themed venture.

I would give One Special Night 5 stars - even more if I could - but it is cheapened by combination with the other two movies.  This set is an example of the very best and very worst holiday fare produced for TV.
All three of these movies were fun to watch, but "One Special Night" was really great, but how could it not be with James Garner and Julie Andrews!?!

This was a Christmas present for my Mom, she loves to watch Christmas movies. I haven't watched any of the movies that I've bought off Amazon yet, but she hasn't complained about the quality of them yet so all is good in the world!
Enjoyed all three movies.  Christmas in the Clouds was very interwoven and I had to watch it several times to understand what was happening but I liked it.
Fun Family Holiday Movies.  Loved them
Loved One Special Night, the rest, not

3 good movies, the best one is Christmas in the Clouds great cast, Graham Greene was great when he served dinner and threw in the Dances With Wolves reference it was great, good comedy, I think it was the best of the 3.
One Special Night...Great Movie. Haven't watched others yet.
looking forward to watching this around the holidays

I got this as it had "one special night" on it.  I remembered it from tv a while back.  Still good as when first seen.  How nice to get two additional movies.  A great value for 3 for the price of one!
Movie were good, but no CC for hearing I.paired

Only saw One Special Night ...had to buy the three, it was way cheaper.  One Special Night is,to my husband and I a must see movie at Christmas.  A huge favorite of ours.  The chemistry between a
Andrews and Garner is phenomenal.  Highly recommended
All I can say is wonderful and love it
good family stories.
Good heartfelt entertainment.  Just sit back and enjoy.
Great movies I  Loved them all.
Up lifting stories.
3 sweet movies for a good price.  Perfect for the Christmas holidays!
One Special Night was by far the best of the three films; alone would be a five. The other two were more of the three level.

I bought this originally for "The Christmas Clause". I actually like "One Special Night" even more. That one, with James Gardner and Julie Andrews, is a very good movie. I can't believe I had never even heard of it before buying this dvd collection.
I honestly only bought this movie for the movie One Special Night. It is very good.  Have not seen the others yet.
One Special Night is my favorite Christmas movie and I'm proud to have the others.  One Special Night is played at our house all year long.  Purchased this for my best friend also.
wonderful service,outstanding Xmas movies for older and younger people Thanks again.
Very nice set of Christmas movies.
GREAT SERVICE AND PRODUCT
wonderfull movie
AMAZON YOU HAVE THE BEST COLLECTION OF CHRISTMAS MOVIES. I LOVE CHRISTMAS
Was cheaper than purchasing the two I wanted ..plus got an extra movie.  Enjoyed all three movies.

One Special Night is one of our most favorite Christmas Movies of all time!  It will appeal to old and young couples alike.  Young children will not understand though.  You cannot beat the acting from these two seasoned professionals
who light up the screen with heartwarming chemistry and fun humor!  Highly recommend this movie!  Two of my favorite movies in the trio!
Good movies
Can't beat a good Christmas movie
ALl three movies are very good, but mostly I wanted One Special Night.  Has to be one of the best love stories around!
Great product... Fast shipping Great price
I watched two of the movies but my DVD player doesn't know how to switch to the third movie.  I guess I need a new DVD player.  Otherwise, I enjoyed the Julie Andrews movie very much.
nice addition to my Christmas movies
Good
I'm one of those Christmas nuts. I try to get all the Christmas type movies I can,I watch them all year round.
Interesting stories..... good for relaxing in front of a roaring fire and glass of wine... great watching on a quiet afternoon

Fantastic Story and kept me going through the holiday season.  No longer having cable TV it was hard to find the movies I wanted to watch.  I chose several and WOW they were fantastic this is just one of them.

A moment ago, I had opened up the Holiday Triple Feature DVD's that I purchased and the way the inside of the DVD box was set up, I expected to see 3 DVD's but upon closer examination, 2 of the movies was on one DVD, so I apologize for contacting Amazon, wanting to return the item. Everything is A-OK, thank you!!!
Love the warm and happy moments in these films that makes Christmas so wonderful for families and friends.  It puts everyone in a spirit of love and joy.  Need more films like these!
Movies were very good they were very spiritual and well played I enjoyed them very much and I love Christmas movies

All of them are good movies especially the hilarious  christmas clause and feel good movie one special night .Christmas clouds has a cynic sense of humor and also a funny movie .I recommend this holiday triple feature during your holiday or whenever  and you willl not be dissapointed.

This was intended as a review copy for someone else.  I don't know what she thought of it but I really enjoyed the movie One Special Night.  The other two were hardly worth watching.  You may like all or none.
One Special Night is a wonderful movie. I watched it many times both during and after Christmas season. The other movies are ok. Kind of hokey, though, but cute

Have only watched one movie on here thus far, Christmas in the Clouds....great native American love story, with humor, some cultural aspects filmed in a gorgeous setting.  Not fast moving, but relationally engaging.
I enjoyed One Special Night. The others were a bit cheesy. But I could sit and watch CHRISTmas movies all day long so you have to take a few bad with the good.
James Garner and Julie Andrews are always great together and One Special Night was a very good movie..........the other two movies were just so-so.
I bought this as a gift.  I love James Garner & Julie Andrews in 'One Special Night' (originally on TV), and with this product, you get 2 bonus Christmas movies!  How can you go wrong!?
I saw One Special Night on tv and loved it. The other two were worth watching which brought the video from a 5 to a 4

I had 'One Special Night' which I had gotten on TV, but there were some less than perfect spots in it.  It did not come through as clearly as I would have liked, but it was "free".  This year when I saw the disc I ordered it cost less than a disc with ONLY the movie I wanted and it was accompanied by 2 more Christmas movies.  Three for less than one!  How could I resist.  All three movies were wonderful.  Talk about a Win - Win situation.  I was delighted.
Nice movies - just as expected. Unfortunately have not enough time to watch them all. Will do it soon - hope so.
Great Christmas movies to put you in the Christmas mood and make your holidays even better.  I am a big James Garner fan and always enjoy his movies.  He does a great job in this movie.

I bought this for the movie One Special Night which  was recommended by a friend. I adored that movie and have watched it 3 times with a diffferent friend each time. There were two other movies which I also enjoyed.  I'm a hallmark movie watcher and these are similar. This was a used DVD and played perfectly.  Great seller, fast shipping.
I bought this DVD because I love James Garner films and this one was a keeper for future viewing pleasures.
Christmas in the Clouds is a film that makes this set worth buying.  That film is funny and heart warming.
Awesome--Great Family movies to enjoy during this Christmas Season of Celebration.  Remember family is what really matter and the celebration of Christ in Christmas.
love the movies on it.  It came in excellent condition.
Love it...

Delivered on Time.
Was what I was told and wanted.  Great !!!!
Packging was very good.
Several good movies in one package is great!
Doesn't have to be December to watch these shows! Thank you.

As Omar said, "Who could ask for anything more"  A wonderful winter love story with wonderful people.  My husband said July Andrews was his favorite singer and he would leave me any day for her.  I personally think he fell in love with her Jaguar.
